title: Giannantonio Sperotto
text:
Giannantonio Sperotto (born November 7, 1950 in <a href="Breganze">Breganze</a>) is a retired <a href="Italy">Italian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played for 5 seasons (66 games, 8 goals) in the <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> for <a href="Vicenza%20Calcio">Vicenza Calcio</a>, <a href="A.S.%20Varese%201910">A.S. Varese 1910</a>, <a href="S.S.C.%20Napoli">S.S.C. Napoli</a>, <a href="F.C.%20Catanzaro">F.C. Catanzaro</a> and <a href="A.S.%20Roma">A.S. Roma</a>.
